section_title: WORKSHOP ON THE USE OF THE GUIDELINES FOR THE PREPARATION OF NON- ANNEX I NATIONAL COMMUNICATIONS
sentences: This workshop, held in Port Luis, Mauritius, from 8-11 April 2003, examined the guidelines for the preparation of non-Annex I national communications agreed at COP-8.
Participants heard a number of presentations on the guidelines, and other reporting guides and programmes for facilitating the preparation of non-Annex I national communications.
